org.apache.flex.compiler.mxml

Interface IMXMLTextData

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IMXMLUnitData, ISourceLocation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MXMLTextData

    public interface IMXMLTextData
extends IMXMLUnitData
    Represents a block of some form of text found in MXML content.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  IMXMLTextData.TextType
      Represents different kinds of text elements.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.apache.flex.compiler.common.ISourceLocation

      • getCompilableText

        String getCompilableText()
        Gets this unit's compilable text as a String.

        Comments have no compilable text. The compilable text of a CDATA unit is the text between the .

        Returns:
        This unit's compilable text.
